card1.title: ALAN SEARCH - FIND PEOPLE BY NAME

card2.title: FACE SEARCH - PREMIUM FEATURE

card3.title: LOCATION INTELLIGENCE - PREMIUM FEATURE
card3.desc: Find people by location with premium subscription unlimited. Detailed search with city, district, and neighborhood information. $100 / 2000 TL monthly subscription.

landingFaq.title: HAVE QUESTIONS?
landingFaq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Face-Seek

q1.question: What is Face-Seek?
q1.answer: Face-Seek is an advanced AI-powered facial recognition search platform. It allows you to upload a photo and search across multiple engines and OSINT databases to find matching faces on the public internet.

q2.question: How does it work?
q2.answer: Simply upload a face photo. Our AI engine extracts a 128-point biometric signature and simultaneously searches Google, Bing, Yandex, and specialized OSINT databases, returning results with confidence scores.

q3.question: Is it legal?
q3.answer: Yes. Face-Seek only searches publicly available data and is fully compliant with GDPR and KVKK regulations. Users must agree to our acceptable-use policy and confirm their searches are for lawful purposes only.

q4.question: Is my data safe?
q4.answer: Absolutely. All uploads are encrypted with 256-bit encryption and automatically deleted after processing. We do not maintain a persistent biometric database. Your search history and personal data are never shared with third parties.

q5.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q5.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and cryptocurrency payments. All transactions are processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways.

q6.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q6.answer: Yes. There are no long-term contracts or commitments. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Unused credits remain valid for 12 months after purchase.

person2.name: Sarah M.

person3.name: Mehmet K.
